Nine-year-old son appears with chess set.
SON: “Do you want to play chess?”
ME: “Sure.”
SON: “Great. I’ll go easy on you.”
I laugh. Son proceeds to destroy me.
If you’re wondering if parenting is hard, today my son asked me if olden-day pirates preferred tea or coffee.
